title: How to become master in combinatorics - Quora

response.answer_text: I would suggest you to thoroughly follow the 6th chapter(Chapter Name:Counting) of Discrete Mathematics And Its Application by Kenneth H. Rosen. The way the theories and various concepts have been explained and explored you will simply love it.Also many buckets of exercises covering various concepts with answer keys have been provided in the book.Once you thoroughly go thro’ this chapter you will become master of combinatorics. You can download the book from the following link. In case the link does not work just google it there are ample amount of links out there from which you can download. http://www2.fiit.stuba.sk/~kvasnicka/Mathematics%20for%20Informatics/Rosen_Discrete_Mathematics_and_Its_Applications_7th_Edition.pdf
